Once again recalling Yui's instructions, you check your phone to make sure that it's the right time, before [pc.stepping] over to the base of the south-western tower. The narrow path which separates the wall from the houses within the town gives the demonic spider-girl two avenues of approach, and then of course there's the route she took to ambush you last time; abseiling down from the tower itself.

Due to the narrow confines of the path, you can't avoid standing beneath the tower, and so despite knowing that Yui will want to drop down on top you, you have no choice but to wait in the perfect position for her. Although you want to constantly be looking up to try and foil her plans, you also have to keep an eye on both directions of the path in case she decides to make a more conventional entrance. Unfortunately for you, the [yui.race]'s speed is impossible to beat, and even though you only take your eye off the tower for a few seconds as you look up and down the path, the demonic spider-girl is suddenly on top of you.

Did you really think you'd be able to see me coming?)] she evilly hisses into your [pc.ear(true)] as she uses all six of her arms to lock your limbs and neck in a vice-like grip. You let out a masochistic moan as she painfully pushes her knee into your back, and after letting out a cruel laugh, she demands, [yui.speech(Tell me what I am to you, toy, and I'll let you go.)]

Is that sub going to be you? Or did you come here to waste my time?)]

If anything, I should be the one asking you to pay me... So, my clients are expecting to find a pathetic sub all bound up and ready to be fucked in my dungeon tonight. Is that sub going to be you?
